title: L. Annaei Senecae Philosophi Opera, quae extant omnia: A Iusto Lipsio Emendata et Scholiis Illustrata. Editio Secunda, atque ab ultima Lipsii manu
medium: bound volume with 3 engraved illustrations after Sir Peter Paul Rubens, and woodcut historiated initials, on laid paper
dimensions:
plate for frontispiece: 31 x 18.8 cm (12 3/16 x 7 3/8 in.)
book: 39.2 x 27 x 9 cm (15 7/16 x 10 5/8 x 3 9/16 in.)
attribution: Lucius Annaeus Seneca (Roman author), Justus Lipsius (editor), Cornelis Galle I and Theodor Galle (engravers) after Sir Peter Paul Rubens (designer)
